document_data.name: Sabriz Rinzyn Kho
document_data.mainbody: briz had gray skin and white hair tied back. She wore an elaborate mask and a cultist outfit that exposed most of her body, and wielded a spiked [[mace]].
document_data.Description: Sabriz had gray skin and white hair tied back. She wore an elaborate mask and a cultist outfit that exposed most of her body, and wielded a spiked [[mace]].
document_data.Abilities: Sabriz could call on a number of powerful spells, including ''[[mass inflict critical wounds]]'', ''[[firestorm]]'', ''[[cometfall]]'', and ''[[unholy blight]]''.
document_data.History: During the [[Darkening]] of [[Faerûn]],{{DDO-time}} Sabriz served as a leader in the [[Lords of Dust]] cult dedicated to the [[demon]]ic being known as the Spinner of Shadows. As part of a great plot to free their patron, fellow member [[Karas]] fueled a ritual with his life and blasted open a passage into [[w:c:Eberron:Khyber (Underdark)|Khyber]], revealing the way to the [[Spinner's Prison]]. Sabriz joined the other Lords of Dust cultists and monsters there as they attempted to gain access to the prison, but was slain by forces from the [[w:c:Eberron:Church of the Silver Flame|Church of the Silver Flame]] that arrived to stop the escape attempt.
